name: Kevin Rule
description:
you are really serious about having a relationship with some one like myself that is young and fun in body, mind and spirit..I would like to hear from you.
I aIf m semi retired. I am looking for a woman to be intimate with that I can love and be loved share our lives and interests LTR. Honesty is very important!!! If you can not be honest do not contact me. Hopefully you will be romantic, show affection, holding hands, a kiss, cuddling, just being together. Communications is very important. I can not tell what you are thinking. Be able to agree to disagree. I am a frim believer regardless how bad a situation some thing good comes out of it. To me everything happens for a reason. I like lots of humor, practical jokes, one liners. Life is too short therefore why not enjoy. I enjoy learning new things. I enjoy having a relationship for true love and affection. I am not a co-dependent kind of guy or to have a relationship just to say I am in a relationship. .
I am not ready for full Please ask me about it if you are interested.
Make it a Great Time where ever you are and thank you for reading my profile.
